name: The Bleach Game
short_description: My goal is to create an RPG game of the Anime Bleach. As long as the show continues on, I will have the inspiration to continue this game. I am not an expert programmer, actually I consider myself still a novice. I am fairly good with Java, and I will create this game as a Java Application, so it can run on any operating system. It is in sourceforge so it will be open source. You are free to use the code and the sprites, also you are free to send ideas and help with this project. Help will always be welcome.
summary: This will be an RPG game of Bleach (Anime/Manga).
